and this is how you be chill think about
the long term right this one person
there's a thousand other people out
there just give this a shot and think
about even if this does not work well
your goal in this if it works out great
if it doesn't work out you will get
better at managing yourself so
everything in life is about creating a

the second rejection easier you've

when they say no you're not torn out of

can still continue to maintain a

please let me know if it becomes hard
for me I will let you know and then you
fist bump and then you move on with your

caught up with our attachments because
it's all we give our mind time to do
